department: Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada, Ottawa
short_summary: Supply and Delivery of Bottled Water and Water Dispensers for the Canadian Embassy in Beijing, China
description: The contract is for the supply and delivery of bottled water and water dispensers. The offeror must provide repair and cleaning services for the duration of the contract. All items must meet the required specifications.
full_summary:
***Tender Notice***

### **Supply and Delivery of Bottled Water and Water Dispensers for the Canadian Embassy in Beijing, China**

**Reference Number:** CB-139-22659671

**Publication Date:** June 7, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** June 25, 2024 at 14:00 EDT

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)**

The Government of Canada invites bids for a Supply and Delivery of Bottled Water and Water Dispensers for the Canadian Embassy in Beijing, China.

**Description of Goods/Services:**

The Offeror is required to supply bottled drinking water, water dispensers, and provide repair/cleaning services for the duration of this contract. The bottled drinking water and water dispensers must meet the required specifications, which can be found in the tender documents.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada Chile Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada UK TCA)

**Eligibility:**

Offers from foreign providers are welcome.

**Submission Instructions:**

The Request for Standing Offer document can be found on [Canada Buys](https://buyconnect.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/) by searching for Tender Number 24-264755. Offers must be submitted electronically through the website.

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:

Mission Procurement – AAGC

Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca

### **Important Notes:**

* The tender is open to all interested parties.
* The offeror must ensure that all quoted prices include all applicable taxes.
* The contract will be entered into for a period of five years with the offeror.
* The offeror must meet the required specifications outlined in the tender documents.

Please ensure that you review the tender documents carefully before submitting your offer. We look forward to receiving your bid. #tender #government procurement #bidding #contract  2024-06-07
